title: Bug 117189Contribution: reduce overhead when no aspects define
description: Bug 117189Contribution: reduce overhead when no aspects define
OB: This patch to the ClassLoaderWeavingAdaptor adds two optimizations when enabledis false for the adaptor: it immediately returns false for accept and it alsoavoids the overhead of constructing a weaver or world.It also contains commented out code that was letting me improve performance byloading reflective proxies instead of creating BCEL objects for a resolutionloader (which is currently broken since reflective proxies now require aReflectionWorld...)
